original: Bourghardt, Josua, e. o. hovrättsnotarie, konsul, Göteborg, f. 17/2/93 i Vinslöv, Krist. 1., av grosshandl. Joh. Svensson o. Christina Svensson. G. m. Karin Månsson. Barn: Anne-Christine f. 26, Åke 28, Kjell 29. — Ex. fr. hand:gymn. 11, uti. korresp. 12, stud :ex. i Lund 13, jur. kand. 19. Deläg. i fabr :firm’a J. Svensson & Bourghardt i Gbg (gr. 81) 17, ensam inneh. av föret. sed. 39. Fd. led. av munic:fullm. o. komm:fullm., ordf. i beredn:utsk. 22-24, styr:led. o. sekr. i S. Sv:es stärkelseprod. fören. 19-23, fd. led. av polisnd o. poliskoll., v. ordf. i styr. f. Gbgs yrkessk., kassaförvalt. i fattigv :styr. o. gas- o. elverk, led. av styr. f. prakt, mellansk. o. Sv. massan, v. ordf. i Sv. leverant :förb. av möbler :material, ordf. i Sv. annonsö-rers fören. v. avd., Sv. täck- o. madrass fabr: fören. (vadd, fjäderrenseri-er o. tagelspinn.), Sv. resårfabr., hem-inredn :bran’sch., isamarb :komm., Sv. flaggans dags i Gbg arb :utsk. o. Riks-fören. f. svenskh. bev. i uti., led. av boihstyr., v. åld :m. i Skånegililet m. m. Paraguays konsul i Gbg sed. 37. Hob-bies: blomsterodHng, jakt. RVO, Gbgs o. Boh. 1. skytteförb. förtj :GM, Fr.-Sv. fören. förtj :GM, K vi bergs skyttefören. GM o. hed :led., FBisk-ftjM, poilislkamm. förtj :pilak. i guM.
translated: Bourghardt, Josua, assistant court clerk, consul, Gothenburg, born on February 17th, 1893 in Vinslöv, Kristianstad County, to the wholesaler Joh. Svensson and Christina Svensson. Married to Karin Månsson with three children: Anne-Christine, born in 1926, Åke in 1928, and Kjell in 1929. He finished his high school education in 1911, his correspondence studies in 1912, and graduated from Lund University with a law degree in 1919. Co-owner of the J. Svensson & Bourghardt firm in Gothenburg since 1917, and sole owner since 1939. Former member of the municipal and commune councils, chairman of the committee from 1922 to 1924, board member and secretary of the Swedish Starch Producers Association from 1919 to 1923, former member of the police board and district police commissioner, vice-chairman of the board for Gothenburg's vocational school, financial manager for the poor board and the gas and electricity company, board member for practical, intermediary, and Swedish trade fairs, vice-chairman of the Swedish Furniture Materials Suppliers Association, chairman of the Swedish Advertisers Association's local department, member of the Swedish Mattress and Spring Manufacturing Association (cotton wool, feather cleaning, and horsehair spinning), Swedish Spring Manufacturing Association, home furnishing industry, cooperation committee, Gothenburg's Swedish flag day work committee and the National Association for Swedes in foreign countries, member of the housing board, senior member of the Skåne Guild, etc. Consul of Paraguay in Gothenburg since 1937. Hobbies: gardening and hunting. Awarded the Royal Order of Vasa, Gothenburg and Bohuslän Shooting Association's medal of merit, French-Swedish Association's medal of merit, Kviberg's Shooting Society's medal of merit and honorary membership, the Finnish White Rose Medal, and the police chamber's medal of merit.
